titleInfo.title: Works Progress Administration schedule of hourly wages

mods.abstract: Mimeographed WPA form listing occupational titles of skilled labor, hourly wages, hours of work, and monthly earnings. Occupations include artist, blacksmith, Braille proofreader, forelady and foreman (they earned the same), glazier, librarian, musician, photographer, plasterer, roofer, stone mason, teacher, terrazzo layer, and welder.
mods.accessCondition: While TSLA houses an item, it does not necessarily hold the copyright on the item, nor may it be able to determine if the item is still protected under current copyright law.
